typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		SalesChannel as string,
		Beverages as double,
		chocolates as double,
		buisctes as double,
		cooldrinks as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 unpivot(output(
		
	),
	lateral: true,
	ignoreNullPivots: false) ~> Unpivot1
